pages.title: Storage Actuator
pages.text: The $(item)Dimensional Storage Actuator$() consists of a $(l:rituals/crafting/craft_dimensional_matrix)Dimensional Matrix$(/l) inhabited by a Djinni that creates and manages a storage dimension, and a $(l:rituals/crafting/craft_storage_controller_base)Base$(/l), infused with a Foliot that moves items in and out of the storage dimension.
